title: Excellent App
comment: Now I know the names of all those hills around me.

title: A great resource.
comment: After I got the calibration correct it was dead-on accurate and could identify even the smallest Hills on the horizon. Well done!

title: Lebanon
comment: Not working or too confusing with lebanese mountains and hills. Not efficient...

title: User interface not (yet) very clear
comment: [updated: the database problem has been fixed (very quickly)] The introduction text is really too long for such a simple app. Should just directly display the calibration the first time and the user can read the help text later if he wants to.  The FOV calibration should make it more clear that there is a red band on the border. Didn't notice it first. In addition once you've tapped, the text should update (to say that the second part of the calibration is going on), to let the user know that the tap was registered. Unfortunately, it seems my phone doesn't have enough RAM for the app to run smoothly so I couldn't test it further. Nevertheless the idea seems good and it's open source  so I give 3 stars :-)

title: Compass not working
comment: The compass did not work. I have other apps that do work, so this is not my equipment.
I've added quite a few fixes into the compass code - hopefully it will have covered your issue - let me know if it doesn't!
